author: pramirez
msg: OODT-346 pcs ops ui archetype. Iniitial checkin.
To use this archetype while in development check out https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/oodt/trunk/mvn/archetypes/opsui and run "mvn install".
This will present a prompt with ability to select an archetype. Here is an example of what you might see and the responses:

Now merely cd into "my-ops-ui" or whatever you designated as the artifactId and then type "mvn tomcat:run-war". You should then be able to head to http://localhost:8080/my-ops-ui and see the app running. You should of course set the variables in the src/main/webapp/META-INF/context.xml or have those environment variables set. If you would like to skin this new opsui merely follow the same structure as the opsui project in the OODT trunk. There will be a wiki to further describe this skinning process at some point.
